posts.post_content:
Posted By: Frank Ceresi
Hi all

I was wondering if anyone had any photos of any players wearing sweaters from the Washington American League baseball club that had the work "Senators" emblazoned on it. I am only interested in any of the old timers from before 1945 or so. I understand that there are sweaters with Senators on them even though the club was officially dubbed the Nationals from 1905 until 1956.

Thanks in advance.

Frank Ceresi

[url]http://www.fcassociates.com[/url]

Posted By: t206king
try this website, type in the year and u can c the pics
